comment:
>>38637544

> You: “How's it going?”
> Eric: “At Camille's. Ex couldn't make it = score!”
> Eric: “You coming?”
> You: “Probably not”
> Eric: “Yeah didn't think so, alright later”

You text Eric as you make your way around your room, stretching your arms high above your head so as not to be a vegetable. With a groan, you lean back, falling onto your bed, hand extended to the side with your smartphone in your palm. You're fed, you guess, and hydrated as well. There isn't really a whole lot else to do. Really, you don't want to do anything else.

> Take a quick nap before the raid.
> Keep busy for another hour or so.
> Take another look at what's happening on message boards.
> Log onto BSO.
name: Sylvetica
